attributes.action: Dismissal of all Current MPs and the disolvement of the current parliament.
attributes.additional_details: 67 million people and a 52 to 48 percent vote in favour of leaving.
attributes.background:
600+ MPs whom have gone against what there constichuanties told them to do.
Each MP has disgraced their country and have at all times been on their own personal agenda for their own personal benefit
